overview: Titof is a cute, young French student who was sent to one of England's strictest boarding schools. Discipline, uniforms, cold showers and punishments of all kinds are a daily routine for our young boys. But that all changes at night when they escape Sir Warlock's supervision and meet up in the toilets to take part in a fantastic shagathon!  A few days after his arrival, Titof becomes acquainted with his roommate and soon enough they fall in love with each other and share all sorts of forbidden and perverse sexual pleasures. A welcoming comfort for our French cutie who has spent the last few days being introduced to the school's rules by his English mates in quite a wild wayâ€¦
tagline: Fifteen studious studs get educated in ways their parents never imagined. Get a tour of what higher education is really all about- hot men and even hotter fucking. See why this fraternity should be called Sigma-Cum-Loudly!
title: Titof and the College Boys
